write-project-docs.description: Orchestrate creation of all 5 project documentation files (Project Overview, Use Cases, Functional Requirements, Wireframes, UX Flows). Use when starting new project and need complete documentation set.

write-project-overview.description: Create Project_Overview.md with high-level vision, goals, and architecture. Use when starting new project, defining vision, outlining roadmap.

write-use-cases.description: Create Use_Cases.md with user stories and scenarios. Use when defining user interactions, writing user stories, documenting scenarios.

write-functional-requirements.description: Create Functional_Requirements.md with detailed feature specifications. Use when defining features, specifying requirements, documenting system behavior.

write-wireframes.description: Create Wireframes.md with UI mockups and screen descriptions. Use when designing UI, creating mockups, documenting screens.

write-ux-flows.description: Create UX_Flows.md with user journey diagrams and interaction flows. Use when mapping user journeys, documenting flows, creating navigation diagrams.

review-project-docs.description: Cross-review the 5 project documentation files for consistency, traceability, and contradictions. Produces an actionable review report with concrete change requests per file.

write-spec.description: Create requirements.md from user input. Use when writing specifications, defining requirements, creating user stories.

write-design.description: Create design.md from requirements. Use when designing architecture, planning technical implementation, defining system design.

write-tasks.description: Create tasks.md from design. Use when breaking down work, creating task lists, planning implementation steps.

execute-tasks.description: Execute tasks from tasks.md. Use when implementing features, writing code, building functionality.

quick-implement.description: Quick implementation without full specs for small features. Use for simple features, prototypes, experiments.

refine-spec.description: Refine and improve existing specifications. Use when updating requirements, clarifying specs, improving documentation.

research-prd.description: Research and create PRD for iOS/mobile apps. Use when analyzing market, competitors, defining features, writing product requirements.
